name: laughingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If you do something laughingly, you are laughing while you are doing it: He laughingly pointed out our mistakes.
disapproving If you say something is laughingly described in a particular way, you think this thing is so bad that it does not deserve the description: It is only one of the absurd rules in the system of law laughingly known as British justice.
